name: DailyKindness|SpreadingKindnessintheWorld
0:
”Alexa, Open Daily Kindness”
”Alexa, Start Daily Kindness”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily kindness
des:
Daily Kindness provides you with a different daily suggested act of kindness.
This Skill features 50 popular activities to to try with family and friends. 
Use this skill to be inspired to act kind all year long.

Don't forget to email your ideas to info@geekgirlmarketing.com.

Start each day with the simple invocation phrase, "Alexa, Open Daily Kindness" and Alexa will provide a different daily random idea about how to integrate kindness into your daily life each day. 

Want to add an act of kindness to the list? Send us an email at info@geekgirlmarketing.com and we will be adding contributed ideas weekly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
